perturbation.original_text: "Add-On Software Modules" means those computer software programs that (a) provide additional functionality and may be integrated with the existing Hardware and other Software, (b) may be legally exported to the Territory without any export license and (c) WGT elects to include in Exhibit A at a mutually agreed discount percentage.
perturbation.changed_text: "Add-On Software Modules" means those computer software programs that (a) provide additional functionality and may be integrated with the existing Hardware and other Software, (b) may be legally exported to the Territory and (c) WGT elects to include in Exhibit A.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition includes a provision for 'a mutually agreed discount percentage' that is removed in the modified version. However, the term 'Add-On Software Modules' is still used elsewhere in the contract with reference to discounts, creating a contradiction. This creates uncertainty as to whether a discount applies and how it's determined.

perturbation.original_text: WGT may, from time to time, change its WatchGuard Price List, provided that any such change will not be effective under this Agreement unless and until the expiration of forty-five (45) days after WGT gives Distributor written notices of the change.
perturbation.changed_text: WGT may, from time to time, change its WatchGuard Price List.
perturbation.explanation: The original text provides a 45 day notice period before a price list change is effective. By removing this clause, WGT can change prices immediately. This creates an internal contradiction if other clauses assume a stable price list for forecasting or minimum purchase calculations.

perturbation.original_text: Any amount not paid when due will be subject to finance charges at the rate of one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month or the maximum rate permitted by applicable law; whichever is less, determined and compounded on a daily basis from the date due until the date paid. Payment of such finance charges will not excuse or cure Distributor's breach or default for late payment. If WGT retains a collection agency, attorney or other person or entity to collect overdue payments, all collection costs, including but not limited to reasonable attorney's fees, will be payable by Distributor.
perturbation.changed_text: Any amount not paid when due will be subject to finance charges. Payment of such finance charges will not excuse or cure Distributor's breach or default for late payment. If WGT retains a collection agency, attorney or other person or entity to collect overdue payments, all collection costs, including but not limited to reasonable attorney's fees, will be payable by Distributor.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies an interest rate of 1.5% per month for late payments. By removing this rate, the contract is left ambiguous as to how the finance charge will be determined. This is a contradiction because other sections of the contract rely on defined financial terms, and the lack of a specific rate creates uncertainty.
